item.title: AngstromCTF2019: Blank Paper
item.description: AngstromCTF2019: Blank Paper The Challenge Blank Paper Misc 30pts Someone scrubbed defund’s paper too hard, and a few of the bytes fell off. Author: defund link: https://files.actf.co/26e1d969c6a7c21d973a64a67f74ea2695ee5b8743cd8f20d9ccde665bbfd368/blank_paper.pdf The Solution The PDF appears unusable to a large number of PDF viewers. But the PDF viewers built into modern browsers are often a little more tolerant. Opening in FireFox reveals the flag:
